thread.title: WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Catchy Tickers, Gun Purchase Monitoring, Diet Vodka

author: WSJ Staff
title: WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Catchy Tickers, Gun Purchase Monitoring, Diet Vodka
text: A WORD FROM THE EDITOR Dear readers, I apologize that the Wealth Adviser Briefing remained on hiatus for so long. We have been busy transitioning to a new team and a new system that will refresh and update the newsletter and improve our delivery process. As of today, we are resuming daily publication of the newsletter, and China Iron-Ore Futures Open to Outside World Next Banks See Crude Prices Rising This Yearâ€”Energy Journal
